Metadata: Dopaminergic influence on gonadotropin secretion in white sturgeon "Acipenser transmontanus"

The present study was designed to explore possible dopaminergic neuroendocrine regulation of pituitary gonadotropin (GTH) secretion in Chondrostean fish by assessing the effects of dopamine and pimozide on both a spontaneous and GnRHa-induced release of two distinct GTHs.
